channel.title: PowerApps on Grant's Website
channel.description: Recent content in PowerApps on Grant's Website

item.title: Power Automate - Intune Cert Connector Health
item.description: I’ll start off by saying I don’t fully understand what I’ve done here. This whole process stemmed from having to do some icky dev stuff in order to keep my Intune Dev tenant active. I still find it unbelievably moronic that MS don’t provide a tenant for testing Intune without forcing us to do dev stuff to keep it active - I’m on my 4th tenant now and it’s a PITA setting everything up again.
